message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. While $15,000 is my initial asking price, I could be willing to come down to $13,500. This product really is valuable and I'm confident you'd be happy with it.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can we meet in the middle again?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $12,000 is the lowest I can go. I know it's a great product that will really benefit you.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $12,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle?
